ShowName: Azure Rights Management Services Core Skills
Author: BrandiH
Description: Walk with Simon and Carol through the basics of how RMS works, including the popular Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) option. See a demo on how to activate Azure RMS, and learn to enable RMS for apps.

ShowName: Azure Rights Management Services Core Skills
VideoTitle: Mod 3: Protecting the Files Your Users Share
Author: BrandiH
Description: Go deeper into what can be protected and how (native versus generic), and see example workflows and use cases. Learn how the growing ecosystem is embracing RMS and how to protect your enterprise data.

ShowName: Azure Rights Management Services Core Skills
VideoTitle: Mod 4: Tracking and Revoking Usage of Protected Files
Author: BrandiH
Description: â€‹Focus on the new document tracking feature for end users, and see why knowledge of use licenses is essential to understanding revocation. Explore info for admins about logging and reporting.

ShowName: Azure Rights Management Services Core Skills
Author: BrandiH
Description: Examine the Azure RMS templates that make administering RMS easier for both admins and end users. Take a look at default templates, and see tips and tricks for creating your own templates.

ShowName: Azure Rights Management Services Core Skills
Author: BrandiH
Description: Take a look at the RMS connector, which lets on-premises servers benefit from Azure RMS. Explore architecture and deployment steps; see a demo on configuring File Classification Infrastructure (FCI).
